welcome_message_body: Welcome to Parla, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich cultural heritage, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that Parla has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The original terminal at Barajas Airport, now used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, with a modern design and serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: An extension of Terminal 4, also known as the 'satellite terminal', connected by an underground train.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a login and have time limits.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
